data.title: Jump Scares in Village of the Damned (1995)
data.meta_description: Jump scares in the movie are very infrequent. However, those that do happen are quite startling, even if trite.
data.text:
See below for the exact times and descriptions of the 2 jump scares in Village of the Damned, which has a jump scare rating of 2.0.

Jump Scare Rating: Jump scares in the movie are very infrequent. However, those that do happen are quite startling, even if trite.

Synopsis: The population of a small town experience a mysterious blackout. Soon after it ends, ten local women learn that they are pregnant. When the children are born, townspeople quickly realize that something is very wrong.

Contributor: Czejah Oues contributed all the information on this page (Sign up now to become a contributor too! Learn more)

WARNING: The jump scare descriptions listed below may contain minor spoilers

Jump Scare Times

The jump scare timings listed below are based on a theatrical viewing and are approximate only.

00:16:30 – A man in hazmat suit suddenly enters the room.

01:03:33 – A distorted face suddenly flashes on-screen.
